plot: It's the night before the fashion show and the choice of the center piece causes upheaval: Margo voices her frustration to Ridge that none of her designs made it into the collection while the boss' daughter gets the showstopper in her first year as a designer at Forrester Creations. Rocco continues to be in awe over Ridge's bold fashion style and demeanor. Kristen is having second thoughts about being dishonest with her father and wants to back out. She asks Ridge to convince Eric to give her gown a less prominent spot in the showing. Eric and Ridge both agree though that Kristen's design is the breakout hit of this year's collection - Meanwhile, Stephanie informs Clarke that she will tell Eric that he is creator of the stunning dress attributed to Kristen. Clarke is disappointed that Stephanie thinks it is a possibility that he would betray her family. He professes his devotion for Kristen to Stephanie which causes her to reconsider and keep mum to Eric. After Stephanie has left, suddenly Margo walks out of the bedroom and kisses Clarke.—Torsten B. Tomaschek
